Upper-middle class Americans are already as gods, we just aren’t godlike.

I’m not concerned with biological immortality, but even this life is long enough to make me worry. I am already living in that eternity. I can summon any food in the world to arrive at my doorstep, watch any movie, listen to any music. Applied Divinity Studies
